name: Books Of Splendid Magic (Jennova21)
description:
Looking for an immersive RPG experience set in a stunning open world environment? This is not that game... this is a game about clicking, and yet more clicking.

Books of Splendid Magic is a side scrolling adventure in clicking. Click things, earn mana and unlock all the collectibles. Largely inspired by the game Orchard by Jack Oatley
